name: Black Market
text: +$2\nReveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. You may buy one of them immediately. Put the unbought cards on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order.\d(Before the game, make a Black Market deck out of one copy of each Kingdom card not in the supply.)

name: Envoy
text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.

name: Governor
text: +1 Action\nChoose one; you get the version in parentheses: Each player gets +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from his hand and gain a card costing exactly $1 ($2) more.

name: Prince
text: You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to $4. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if you fail to set it aside on a turn you play it.)

name: Stash
text: Worth $2\dWhen you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.

name: Summon
text: Allows the buyer to gain a cheap Action card and play it immediately at the start of their next turn.

name: Walled Village
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\dAt the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this on top of your deck.

name: Adventurer
text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards in your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

name: Bureaucrat
text: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

name: Cellar
text: +1 Action\nDiscard any number of cards.\n+1 Card per card discarded.

name: Chancellor
text: +$2\nYou may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

name: Chapel
text: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

name: Council Room
text: +4 Cards\n+1 Buy\nEach other player draws a card.

name: Feast
text: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to $5.

name: Festival
text: +2 Actions\n+1 Buy\n+$2.

name: Gardens
text: Worth 1VP for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

name: Laboratory
text: +2 Cards\n+1 Action.

name: Library
text: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

name: Market
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+$1.

name: Militia
text: +$2\nEach other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

name: Mine
text: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to $3 more; put it into your hand.

name: Moat
text: +2 Cards\dWhen another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

name: Moneylender
text: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +$3.

name: Remodel
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $2 more than the trashed card.

name: Smithy
text: +3 Cards

name: Spy
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nEach player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice.

name: Thief
text: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

name: Throne Room
text: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

name: Village
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions

name: Witch
text: +2 Cards\nEach other player gains a Curse card.

name: Woodcutter
text: +1 Buy\n+$2

name: Workshop
text: Gain a card costing up to $4.

name: Baron
text: +1 Buy\nYou may discard an Estate card. If you do, +$4.\nOtherwise, gain an Estate card.

name: Bridge
text: +1 Buy\n+$1\nAll cards (including cards in players' hands) cost $1 less this turn, but not less than $0.

name: Conspirator
text: +$2\nIf you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card; +1 Action.

name: Coppersmith
text: Copper produces an extra $1 this turn.

name: Courtyard
text: +3 Cards\nPut a card from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Duke
text: Worth 1VP per Duchy you have.

name: Great Hall
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\dWorth 1VP

name: Harem
text: Worth $2\nWorth 2VP

name: Ironworks
text:
Gain a card costing up to $4. If it is an...
Action card, +1 Action
Treasure card, +$1
Victory card, +1 Card

name: Masquerade
text: +2 Cards\nEach player passes a card in their hand to the player on their left. Then you may trash a card from your hand.

name: Mining Village
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\nYou may trash this card immediately. If you do, +$2.

name: Minion
text: +1 Action\nChoose one: +$2; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

name: Nobles
text: Choose one: +3 Cards; or +2 Actions.\dWorth 2VP

name: Pawn
text: Choose two: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +$1.\n(The choices must be different.)

name: Saboteur
text: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing $3 or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most $2 less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

name: Scout
text: +1 Action\nReveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

name: Secret Chamber
text: Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded.\dWhen another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

name: Shanty Town
text: +2 Actions\nReveal your hand.\nIf you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

name: Steward
text: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +$2; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

name: Swindler
text: +$2\nEach other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

name: Torturer
text: +3 Cards\nEach other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

name: Trading Post
text: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

name: Tribute
text:
The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an...
Action Card, +2 Actions
Treasure Card, +$2
Victory Card, +2 Cards

name: Upgrade
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nTrash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly $1 more than it.

name: Wishing Well
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nName a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

name: Ambassador
text: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply.\nThen each other player gains a copy of it.

name: Bazaar
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\n+$1.

name: Caravan
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nAt the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

name: Cutpurse
text: +$2\nEach other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

name: Embargo
text: +$2\nTrash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile.\dWhen a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

name: Explorer
text: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

name: Fishing Village
text: +2 Actions\n+$1\nAt the start of your next turn: +1 Action; +$1.

name: Ghost Ship
text: +2 Cards\nEach other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

name: Haven
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nSet aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

name: Island
text: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.\dWorth 2VP

name: Lighthouse
text: +1 Action\nNow and at the start of your next turn: +$1.\dWhile this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

name: Lookout
text: +1 Action\nLook at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

name: Merchant Ship
text: Now and at the start of your next turn: +$2.

name: Native Village
text: +2 Actions\nChoose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand.\nYou may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.

name: Navigator
text: +$2\nLook at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Outpost
text: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

name: Pearl Diver
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nLook at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

name: Pirate Ship
text: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +$1 per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

name: Salvager
text: +1 Buy\nTrash a card from your hand. +$ equal to its cost.

name: Sea Hag
text: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

name: Smugglers
text: Gain a copy of a card costing up to $6 that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

name: Tactician
text: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards; +1 Buy; and +1 Action.

name: Treasure Map
text: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Treasury
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\n+$1\dWhen you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

name: Warehouse
text: +3 Cards\n +1 Action\nDiscard 3 cards.

name: Wharf
text: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards\n+1 Buy.

name: Alchemist
text: +2 Cards\n+1 Action\dWhen you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.

name: Apothecary
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nReveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top in any order.

name: Apprentice
text: +1 Action\nTrash a card from your hand. +1 Card per Coin it costs. +2 Cards if it has Þ in its cost.

name: Familiar
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nEach other player gains a curse.

name: Golem
text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards. Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

name: Herbalist
text: +1 Buy\n+$1\dWhen you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

name: Philosopher's Stone
text: When you play this, count your deck and discard pile. Worth $1 per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

name: Possession
text: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him. Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

name: Scrying Pool
text: +1 Action\nEach player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn't an Action. Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.

name: Transmute
text: Trash a card from your hand. If it is an... Action card, gain a Duchy\nTreasure card, gain a Transmute\nVictory card, gain a Gold

name: University
text: +2 Actions\nYou may gain an Action card costing up to $5.

name: Vineyard
text: Worth 1VP for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

name: Bank
text: When you play this, it's worth $1 per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

name: Bishop
text: +$1\n+1VP\nTrash a card from your hand. +VP equal to half its cost in coins, rounded down. Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

name: City
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\nIf there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +$1 and +1 Buy.

name: Contraband
text: Worth $3\n+1 Buy\nWhen you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

name: Counting House
text: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

name: Expand
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3 more than the trashed card.

name: Forge
text: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.

name: Goons
text: +1 Buy\n+$2\nEach other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.\dWhile this is in play, when you buy a card, +1VP.

name: Grand Market
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+$2\dYou can't buy this if you have any Copper in play.

name: Hoard
text: Worth $2\dWhile this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

name: King's Court
text: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

name: Loan
text: Worth $1\nWhen you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

name: Mint
text: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.\dWhen you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

name: Mountebank
text: +$2\nEach other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

name: Peddler
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\n+$1\dDuring your Buy phase, this costs $2 less per Action card you have in play, but not less than $0.

name: Quarry
text: Worth $1\dWhile this is in play, Action cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0.

name: Rabble
text: +3 Cards\nEach other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

name: Royal Seal
text: Worth $2\dWhile this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

name: Talisman
text: Worth $1\dWhile this is in play, when you buy a card costing $4 or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

name: Trade Route
text: +1 Buy\n+$1 per token on the Trade Route mat.\nTrash a card from your hand.\dSetup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

name: Vault
text: +2 Cards\nDiscard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded. Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

name: Venture
text: Worth $1\nWhen you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

name: Watchtower
text: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.\dWhen you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

name: Worker's Village
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\n+1 Buy

name: Bag of Gold
text: +1 Action\nGain a Gold, putting it on top of your deck.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Diadem
text: Worth $2\nWhen you play this, +$1 per unused Action you have (Action, not Action card).\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Fairgrounds
text: Worth 2VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (round down).

name: Farming Village
text: +2 Actions\nReveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

name: Followers
text: +2 Cards\nGain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Fortune Teller
text: +$2\nEach other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

name: Hamlet
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Action.
You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Buy.

name: Harvest
text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +$1 per differently named card revealed.

name: Horn of Plenty
text: Worth $0\nWhen you play this, gain a card costing up to $1 per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it's a Victory card, trash this.

name: Horse Traders
text: +1 Buy\n+$3\nDiscard 2 cards.\dWhen another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

name: Hunting Party
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nReveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn't a duplicate of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Jester
text: +$2\nEach other player discards the top card of his deck. If it's a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise either he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

name: Menagerie
text: +1 Action\nReveal your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.

name: Princess
text: +1 Buy\dWhile this is in play, cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Remake
text: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand, then gain a card costing exactly $1 more than the trashed card.

name: Tournament
text:
+1 Action
Each player may reveal a Province from his hand.
If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck.
If no-one else does, +1 Card, +$1.

name: Trusty Steed
text: Choose two: +2 Cards; or +2 Actions; or +$2; gain 4 Silvers and put your deck into your discard pile.

name: Young Witch
text: +2 Cards\nDiscard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse.\dSetup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing $2 or $3 to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.

name: Border Village
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\dWhen you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.

name: Cache
text: Worth $3\dWhen you gain this, gain two Coppers.

name: Cartographer
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nLook at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

name: Crossroads
text: Reveal your hand.\n+1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.

name: Develop
text: Trash a card from your hand.\nGain a card costing exactly $1 more than it and a card costing exactly $1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.

name: Duchess
text: +$2\nEach player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back.\dIn games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

name: Embassy
text: +5 Cards\nDiscard 3 cards.\dWhen you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

name: Farmland
text: Worth 2VP\dWhen you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly $2 more than the trashed card.

name: Fool's Gold
text: If this is the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, this is worth $1, otherwise it's worth $4.\dWhen another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.

name: Haggler
text: +$2\dWhile this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

name: Highway
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\dWhile this is in play, cards cost $1 less, but not less than $0.

name: Ill-Gotten Gains
text: Worth $1\nWhen you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand.\dWhen you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.

name: Inn
text: +2 Cards\n+2 Actions\nDiscard 2 cards.\dWhen you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Jack of All Trades
text:
Gain a Silver.
Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back.
Draw until you have 5 cards in hand.
You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

name: Mandarin
text: +$3\nPut a card from your hand on top of your deck.\dWhen you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.

name: Margrave
text: +3 Cards\n+1 Buy\nEach other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

name: Noble Brigand
text: +$1\nWhen you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn't reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.

name: Nomad Camp
text: +1 Buy\n+$2\dWhen you gain this, put it on top of your deck.

name: Oasis
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
Discard a card.

name: Oracle
text: Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses.\n+2 Cards

name: Scheme
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nAt the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

name: Silk Road
text: Worth 1VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).

name: Spice Merchant
text: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. If you do, choose one:\n+2 Cards and +1 Action;\nor +$2 and +1 Buy.

name: Stables
text: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.

name: Trader
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in coins.\dWhen you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a silver.

name: Tunnel
text: Worth 2VP\dWhen you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Colony
text: Worth 10VP

name: Copper
text: Worth $1

name: Curse
text: Worth -1VP

name: Duchy
text: Worth 3VP

name: Estate
text: Worth 1VP

name: Gold
text: Worth $3

name: Platinum
text: Worth $5

name: Potion
text: Worth Þ

name: Province
text: Worth 6VP

name: Silver
text: Worth $2

name: Altar
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $5.

name: Armory
text: Gain a card costing up to $4. Put it on top of your deck.

name: Band of Misfits
text: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose.\nThis is that card until it leaves play.

name: Bandit Camp
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\nGain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

name: Beggar
text: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand.\dWhen another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.

name: Catacombs
text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.\dWhen you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

name: Count
text: Choose one: Discard 2 cards; put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper.\nChoose one: +$3; trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

name: Counterfeit
text: Worth $1\n+1 Buy\nWhen you play this, you may play a treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that treasure.

name: Cultist
text: +2 Cards\nEach other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.\dWhen you trash this, +3 Cards.

name: Dame Anna
text: You may trash up to 2 cards from your hand.\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Dame Josephine
text: Worth 2VP\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Dame Molly
text: +2 Actions.\nEach other player discards the top 2 cards of his deck, and trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Dame Natalie
text: You may gain a card costing up to $3.\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Dame Sylvia
text: +$2\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Death Cart
text: +$5\nYou may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don't, trash this.\dWhen you gain this, gain 2 Ruins.

name: Feodum
text: Worth 1VP for every 3 Silvers in your deck.\dWhen you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

name: Forager
text: +1 Action\n+1 Buy\nTrash a card from your hand. +$1 per differently named Treasure in the trash.

name: Fortress
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\dWhen you trash this, put it into your hand.

name: Graverobber
text: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from $3 to $6, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to $3 more than it.

name: Hermit
text: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card from your discard pile or hand that is not a Treasure. Gain a card costing up to $3.\dWhen you discard this from play, if you didn't buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.

name: Hovel
text: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.

name: Hunting Grounds
text: +4 Cards\dWhen you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates

name: Ironmonger
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. Either way, if it is an...
Action card, +1 Action
a Treasure card, +$1
a Victory card, +1 Card

name: Junk Dealer
text:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
Trash a card from your hand.

name: Madman
text: +2 Actions\nReturn this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Marauder
text: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

name: Market Square
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\n+1 Buy\dWhen one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Mercenary
text: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, + $2, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Mystic
text:
+1 Action
+$2
Name a card.
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

name: Necropolis
text: +2 Actions

name: Overgrown Estate
text: Worth 0 VP\dWhen you trash this, +1 Card.

name: Pillage
text: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose. Gain 2 Spoils.

name: Poor House
text: +$4\nReveal your hand. -$1 per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of $0.

name: Procession
text: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly $1 more than it.

name: Rats
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nGain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).\dWhen you trash this, +1 Card.

name: Rebuild
text: +1 Action\nName a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to $3 more than it.

name: Rogue
text: +$2\nIf there are any cards in the trash costing from $3 to $6, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest.

name: Ruined Library
text: +1 Card

name: Ruined Market
text: +1 Buy

name: Ruined Village
text: +1 Action

name: Sage
text: +1 Action\nReveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing $3 or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Scavenger
text: +$2\nYou may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

name: Sir Bailey
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Sir Destry
text: +2 Cards\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Sir Martin
text: +2 Buys\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Sir Michael
text: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

name: Sir Vander
text: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.\dWhen you trash this, gain a Gold.

name: Spoils
text: Worth $3\nWhen you play this, return it to the pile.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Squire
text: +$1\nChoose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.\dWhen you trash this, gain an Attack card.

name: Storeroom
text: +1 Buy\nDiscard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded the second time.

name: Survivors
text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.

name: Urchin
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nEach other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.\dWhen you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

name: Vagrant
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nReveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Victory card, Curse, Ruins, or Shelter, put it into your hand.

name: Wandering Minstrel
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\nReveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

name: Advisor
text: +1 Action\nReveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.

name: Baker
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nTake a Coin token.\dSetup: Each player takes a Coin token.

name: Butcher
text: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

name: Candlestick Maker
text: +1 Action\n+1 Buy\nTake a Coin token.

name: Doctor
text: Name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash the matches. Put the rest back on top in any order.\dWhen you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each $1 you overpaid, look at the top card of your deck; trash it, discard it, or put it back.

name: Herald
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nReveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Action, play it.\dWhen you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each $1 you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it on top of your deck.

name: Journeyman
text: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Masterpiece
text: Worth $1\dWhen you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain a Silver per $1 you overpaid.

name: Merchant Guild
text: +1 Buy\n+$1.\dWhile this is in play, when you buy a card, take a Coin token.

name: Plaza
text: +1 Card. +2 Actions. You may discard a Treasure card. If you do, take a Coin token.

name: Soothsayer
text: Gain a Gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.

name: Stonemason
text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it.\dWhen you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

name: Taxman
text: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to $3 more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Alms
text: Once per turn: If you have no Treasures in play, gain a card costing up to $4.

name: Amulet
text: Now and at the start of your next turn, choose one: +$1; or trash a card from your hand; or gain a Silver.

name: Artificer
text:
+1 Action
+1 Card
+$1
Discard any number of cards. You may gain a card costing exactly $1 per card discarded, putting it on top of your deck.

name: Ball
text: Take your -$1 token. Gain 2 cards each costing up to $4.

name: Bonfire
text: Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.

name: Borrow
text: +1 Buy\nOnce per turn: If your -1 Card token isn't on your deck, put it there and +$1.

name: Bridge Troll
text: Each other player takes his -$1 token. Now and at the start of your next turn:\n+1 Buy\dWhile this is in play, cards cost $1 less on your turns, but not less than $0.

name: Caravan Guard
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nAt the start of your next turn, +$1.\dWhen another player plays an Attack card, you may play this from your hand. (+1 Action has no effect if it's not your turn.)

name: Champion
text: +1 Action\nFor the rest of the game, when another player plays an Attack, it doesn't affect you, and when you play an Action, +1 Action.\n(This stays in play. This is not in the Supply.)

name: Coin of the Realm
text: Worth $1\nWhen you play this, put it on your Tavern mat.\dDirectly after resolving an Action, you may call this, for +2 Actions.

name: Disciple
text: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Gain a copy of it.\dWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Teacher.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Distant Lands
text: Put this on your Tavern mat.\dWorth 4VP if on your Tavern mat at the end of the game (otherwise worth 0VP).

name: Dungeon
text: +1 Action\nNow and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, then discard 2 cards.

name: Duplicate
text: Put this on your Tavern mat.\dWhen you gain a card costing up to $6, you may call this, to gain a copy of that card.

name: Expedition
text: Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.

name: Ferry
text: Move your -$2 cost token to an Action Supply pile (cards from that pile cost $2 less on your turns, but not less than $0).

name: Fugitive
text:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
Discard a card.\dWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Disciple.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Gear
text: +2 Cards\nSet aside up to 2 cards from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand.

name: Giant
text: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face down, +$1. If it's face up, +$5, and each other player reveals the top card of his deck, trashes it if it costs from $3 to $6, and otherwise discards it and gains a Curse.

name: Guide
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nPut this on your Tavern mat.\dAt the start of your turn, you may call this, to discard your hand and draw 5 cards.

name: Haunted Woods
text: Until you next turn, when any other player buys a card, he puts his hand on top of his deck in any order.\nAt the start of your next turn:\n+3 Cards

name: Hero
text: +$2\nGain a Treasure.\dWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Champion.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Hireling
text: At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game:\d+1 Card\d(This stays in play.)

name: Inheritance
text: Once per game: Set aside a non-Victory Action card from the Supply costing up to $4. Move your Estate token to it (your Estates gain the abilities and types of that card).

name: Lost Arts
text: Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action).

name: Lost City
text: +2 Cards\n+2 Actions\dWhen you gain this, each other player draws a card.

name: Magpie
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nReveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure, put it into your hand. If it's an Action or Victory card, gain a Magpie.

name: Messenger
text: +1 Buy\n+$2\nYou may put your deck into your discard pile.\dWhen this is your first buy in a turn, gain a card costing up to $4, and each other player gains a copy of it.

name: Miser
text: Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +$1 per Copper on your Tavern mat.

name: Mission
text: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, in which you can't buy cards.

name: Page
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\dWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Treasure Hunter.

name: Pathfinding
text: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card).

name: Peasant
text: +1 Buy\n+$1\dWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Soldier.

name: Pilgrimage
text: Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.

name: Plan
text: Move your Trashing token to an Action Supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)

name: Port
text: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\dWhen you buy this, gain another Port.

name: Quest
text: You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.

name: Raid
text: Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

name: Ranger
text: +1 Buy\nTurn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face up, +5 Cards.

name: Ratcatcher
text: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nPut this on your Tavern mat.\dAt the start of your turn, you may call this to trash a card from your hand.

name: Raze
text: +1 Action\nTrash this or a card from your hand. Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the cost in $ of the trashed card. Put one into your hand and discard the rest.

name: Relic
text: Worth $2\nWhen you play this, each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

name: Royal Carriage
text: +1 Action\nPut this on your Tavern mat.\dDirectly after resolving an Action, if it's still in play, you may call this, to replay that Action.

name: Save
text: +1 Buy\nOnce per turn: Set aside a card from your hand, and put it into your hand at end of turn (after drawing).

name: Scouting Party
text: +1 Buy\nLook at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard 3 of them and put the rest back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Seaway
text: Gain an Action card costing up to $4. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy).

name: Soldier
text: +$2\n+$1 per other Attack you have in play. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand discards a card.\dWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Fugitive.\n(This is not in the Supply)

name: Storyteller
text: +1 Action\n+$1\nPlay up to 3 Treasures from your hand. Pay all of your $; +1 Card per $ paid.

name: Swamp Hag
text: Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he gains a Curse.\nAt the start of your next turn:\n+$3

name: Teacher
text: Put this on your Tavern mat.\dAt the start of your turn, you may call this, to move your +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, or +$1 token to an Action Supply pile you have no token on (when you play a card from that pile you first get that bonus).\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Trade
text: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand.\nGain a Silver per card you trashed.

name: Training
text: Move your +$1 token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +$1).

name: Transmogrify
text: +1 Action\nPut this on your Tavern mat.\nAt the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand, gain a card costing up to $1 more than it, and put that card into your hand.

name: Travelling Fair
text: +2 Buys\nWhen you gain a card this turn, you may put it on top of your deck.

name: Treasure Hunter
text:
+1 Action
+$1
Gain a Silver per card the player to your right gained in his last turn.\dWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Warrior.
(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Treasure Trove
text: Worth $2\nWhen you play this, gain a Gold and a Copper.

name: Warrior
text: +2 Cards\nFor each Traveller you have in play (including this) each other player discards the top card of his deck and trashes it if it costs $3 or $4.\dWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Hero.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

name: Wine Merchant
text: +1 Buy\n+$4\nPut this on your Tavern mat.\dAt the end of your Buy phase, if you have at least $2 unspent, you may discard this from your Tavern mat.
